StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRecruiterTrainingStatuses]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID int AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SET NOCOUNT ON
CREATE TABLE #RecruiterTrainingTmp ( ORG_ID INT )
IF (@Organiza.onID <> 0) BEGIN INSERT INTO #RecruiterTrainingTmp SELECT ORG_ID FROM MCRISS.USMC.GetOrgHierarchyMinimal(@Organiza.onID) END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO #RecruiterTrainingTmp SELECT NULL AS ORG_ID END
SELECT vw.* FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[vwRecrui.ngTrainingStatus] vw INNER JOIN #RecruiterTrainingTmp RTT ON RTT.ORG_ID = vw.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE vw.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'RSS' AND (vw.BILLET = 'Recruiter' OR vw.BILLET IS NULL) AND vw.ArchivedDate IS NULL ORDER BY vw.ORGANIZATION_ID
DROP TABLE #RecruiterTrainingTmp
END
